activities: LightSpeed LLC receives documents from our law firm and corporate clients, either in hard copy or electronic form, for Electronic Data Discovery, Web Hosting, and related services. This information may or may not contain personal data from the European Union and/or the European Economic Area, and Switzerland to the United States.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Legal discovery documents received from our clients and their clients. Data is not manually processed.
